creator: Hands On
descriptionHtml: Hands On connects contingent workforce with small and medium businesses in seconds via its mobile app available on iOS and Android platforms. Businesses and Job-seekers will experience convenience and efficiency of mobile hiring with our cost effective plans and value adds like  geo-location based search & algorithm-based shortlisting, in app chat between job seekers and employers enabling instant communication, Applicant Management & Pre-onboarding and multi-language functionality.
descriptionShort: Find your Next Job or Staff. NOW !

appDetails.developerAddress: 4102 TORRAZZO WAY, EL DORADO HILLS CA 95762 USA

title: Hands On Jobs

container.value: 4102 TORRAZZO WAY, EL DORADO HILLS CA 95762 USA

creator: Hands On
descriptionHtml:
Are you looking for a job search platform to search and find jobs desired by you?

Do you need a job application that will link you to high-quality job recruiters and companies that need to interview & hire candidates like you?

Download Hands On Jobs – the ultimate job search assistant & recommendation portal. Create your profile and view the job postings by companies, individuals, and job recruiters. Start finding opportunities that will uplift your career and help you achieve your desired role. Get Hands On Jobs now for free!

◉ SEARCH JOBS

Set your location and start searching for jobs in your city by keywords. See detailed info about each job posting such as salary, position, location, benefits, and more. Not seeing jobs that suit your aspirations? Simply use the advanced filter options and get job postings that follow the criteria predefined by you (salary, immediate start, employment type, language, and more). Hands On automatically starts recommending the best suited jobs for you !

◉ CRAFT A PERFECT PROFILE

Use your Hands On Jobs profile as your online resume to showcase your education and skills. Make sure to add precise data and create a profile that will make you the perfect candidate for an interview when you apply for a job.

◉ APPLY & FOLLOW THE APPLIED JOBS

Apply for a position that you think is a perfect fit for you. Read the job details before applying, explore the company, check the required education, experience, and employment type, and make the most out of each job application.

◉ GET CONNECTED & CHAT

Our job hiring portal also features an in-app chat between job seekers and employers enabling instant communication, Applicant Management & Pre-onboarding with multi-language functionality. This makes us one of the best career job search and staffing apps at the moment!

◉ HANDS ON JOBS FEATURES FOR JOB SEEKERS:

- Search jobs near you
- Search by filters such as employment type, salary, start date & more
- Create a profile with experience, education, and skills
- Apply for jobs
- See all the applied jobs in one place
- Chat with job recruiters within the app

The next time you are out of a job, or you are stuck at your current job, or maybe you need a part-time job for additional income, get Hands On Jobs!
It’s the best and most complete job portal to find high-quality jobs that will uplift your career. Download it now for FREE!

► HIRE STAFF

Hands On Jobs is not only a platform for job seekers. If you are an individual or a company that needs new employees, Hands On Jobs provides you with access to talented candidates that are ready for hire real-time!

Create a detailed job posting and get relevant job applications from Hands On Jobs job seekers. Filter the best ones and schedule an interview within the app using the in-built chat. Assign tasks to applicants & review their performance before hiring. Get a variety of offers, negotiate salary and conditions, and make the most out of each vacancy. Find great talent that will actually add value to your company. Experience the ultimate convenience and efficiency of mobile hiring - Try Hands On Jobs now for FREE!
descriptionShort: Find jobs with our job recommendation engine. Use it as a job assistant for hire

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The App has been updated to completely enable 11 Indian languages so that blue and grey collar workers can easily find jobs near them.
Hindi, Marathi, Punjabi, Gujarati, Tamil, Kannada, Telugu, Malayalam, Bangla, Odia, Assamese.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The app has been updated to enhance our shortlisting algorithm so that companies get a better smart match of candidates that have applied to their job posts. Smart match is done on the basis of the applicant's industry domain, skills, work experience, education and language skills to see how well they match the job post.
We are also allowing companies to specify area locations from where they would like to accept applications from so that they can get only relevant applications.

Assign tasks to applicants & review their performance before hiring. Get a variety of offers, negotiate salary and conditions, and make the most out of each vacancy. Find great talent that will actually add value to your company. Experience the ultimate convenience and efficiency of mobile hiring - Try Hands On Jobs now for FREE!
descriptionShort: Hands On Job App for Jobs Near You! Get Hired or Start Hiring for FREE today.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The apps have been updated to include new job card and job details page. We have also updated the job seeker profile page to make it more user friendly.

title: Hands On Jobs: Job Search Near Me

creator: Hands On
descriptionHtml:
Are you looking for a job search platform to search and find jobs desired by you?

Do you need a job application that will link you to high-quality job recruiters and companies that need to interview & hire candidates like you?

Download Hands On Jobs – the ultimate job search assistant & recommendation portal. Create your profile and view the job postings by companies, individuals, and job recruiters. Start finding opportunities that will uplift your career and help you achieve your desired role. Get Hands On Jobs now for free!

◉ SEARCH JOBS

Set your location and start searching for jobs in your city by keywords. See detailed info about each job posting such as salary, position, location, benefits, and more. Not seeing jobs that suit your aspirations? Simply use the advanced filter options and get job postings that follow the criteria predefined by you (salary, immediate start, employment type, language, and more). Hands On automatically starts recommending the best suited jobs for you !

◉ CRAFT A PERFECT PROFILE

Use your Hands On Jobs profile as your online resume to showcase your education and skills. Make sure to add precise data and create a profile that will make you the perfect candidate for an interview when you apply for a job.

◉ APPLY & FOLLOW THE APPLIED JOBS

Apply for a position that you think is a perfect fit for you. Read the job details before applying, explore the company, check the required education, experience, and employment type, and make the most out of each job application.

◉ GET CONNECTED & CHAT

Our job hiring portal also features an in-app chat between job seekers and employers enabling instant communication, Applicant Management & Pre-onboarding with multi-language functionality. This makes us one of the best career job search and staffing apps at the moment!

◉ HANDS ON JOBS FEATURES FOR JOB SEEKERS:

- Search jobs near you
- Search by filters such as employment type, salary, start date & more
- Create a profile with experience, education, and skills
- Apply for jobs
- See all the applied jobs in one place
- Chat with job recruiters within the app

The next time you are out of a job, or you are stuck at your current job, or maybe you need a part-time job for additional income, get Hands On Jobs!
It’s the best and most complete job portal to find high-quality jobs that will uplift your career. Download it now for FREE!

► HIRE STAFF

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: In this app build we have removed the chat functionality between job seeker and Company, instead they can call each other directly. Small issues have been fixed for better user experience.

title: Hands On: Jobs Search Near Me

creator: Hands On
descriptionHtml:
Looking for your next dream job? Look no further than our job search app!

Hands On, India’s 1st map-based job search app - Search for the hyper-local job openings in your city and explore career opportunities. Apply for jobs at multinational companies, startups, and small businesses.

Our app offers a comprehensive and user-friendly platform for job seekers to browse and apply for a wide range of job opportunities.

With our app, you can easily create your profile to showcase your skills and experience to potential employers. You can also search for jobs by location, industry, and job title and get job alerts and notifications for new opportunities that match your preferences.

You can find the latest jobs in HR, marketing, engineering, front office, back office, graphic designing, business development, nursing, hospitality, housekeeping, beautician, hair dresser, grooming, and industry work. You can find work from home jobs, part-time jobs, full-time office jobs and on-field jobs. Hands On app is free to download and use. We are committed to helping job seekers find their perfect job and building strong connections between employers and job seekers.

So do not wait! Get your hands on the Hands On app:

- Free sign up for every job seeker
- India’s 1st map based job search app!
- Job at your preferred location
- Language of your choice on the app
- Connecting directly to the HR to fix the interview
- No charges to contact the HR
- Jobs from verified companies

Made with ❤️ in India
descriptionShort: Jobs near you | Full-time/Part-time jobs | Work from home jobs | Genuine jobs

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: In this release we have optimized  user experience to handle existing users flows and to fix some bugs in the earlier release.

title:
Hands On : Jobs on Map
3.8.0
